name: WAYT
description:
WAYT was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 43.

LD43's theme is "sacrifice," and sacrifice, you will. Every brick you land on breaks soon after, so you'd better keep moving if you want to stay alive. WAYT features 10 levels of varying difficulty (hard to super hard). 

TOOLS USED:

Music - Musescore 3

Art - Aseprite

Promo - Gravit Designer

Engine - Godot 3

Have fun! You can contact me at wsavage6316@gmail.com
